articles.title: Inaugural report pioneered by AI Security Institute gives clearest picture yet of capabilities of most advanced AI
articles.description: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.
articles.content: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.

articles.title: AutoGluon assistant: Zero-code AutoML through multiagent collaboration
articles.description: A multiagent architecture separates data perception, tool knowledge, execution history, and code generation, enabling ML automation that works with messy, real-world inputs.
articles.author: Haoyang Fang
articles.content: A multiagent architecture separates data perception, tool knowledge, execution history, and code generation, enabling ML automation that works with messy, real-world inputs.

articles.title: NVIDIA Acquires Open-Source Workload Management Provider SchedMD
articles.description: NVIDIA today announced it has acquired SchedMD — the leading developer of Slurm, an open-source workload management system for high-performance computing (HPC) and AI — to help strengthen the open-source software ecosystem and drive AI innovation for researchers, developers and enterprises. NVIDIA will continue to develop and distribute Slurm as open-source, vendor-neutral software, making it Read Article

articles.content: NVIDIA today announced it has acquired SchedMD — the leading developer of Slurm, an open-source workload management system for high-performance computing (HPC) and AI — to help strengthen the open-source software ecosystem and drive AI innovation for researchers, developers and enterprises. NVIDIA will continue to develop and distribute Slurm as open-source, vendor-neutral software, making it Read Article

articles.title: How NVIDIA H100 GPUs on CoreWeave’s AI Cloud Platform Delivered a Record-Breaking Graph500 Run
articles.description: The world’s top-performing system for graph processing at scale was built on a commercially available cluster. NVIDIA last month announced a record-breaking benchmark result of 410 trillion traversed edges per second (TEPS), ranking No. 1 on the 31st Graph500 breadth-first search (BFS) list. Performed on an accelerated computing cluster hosted in a CoreWeave data center Read Article
articles.author: Prachi Goel
articles.content: The world’s top-performing system for graph processing at scale was built on a commercially available cluster. NVIDIA last month announced a record-breaking benchmark result of 410 trillion traversed edges per second (TEPS), ranking No. 1 on the 31st Graph500 breadth-first search (BFS) list. Performed on an accelerated computing cluster hosted in a CoreWeave data center Read Article

articles.title: Advancing science and math with GPT-5.2
articles.description: GPT-5.2 is OpenAI’s strongest model yet for math and science, setting new state-of-the-art results on benchmarks like GPQA Diamond and FrontierMath. This post shows how those gains translate into real research progress, including solving an open theoretical problem and generating reliable mathematical proofs.
articles.content: GPT-5.2 is OpenAI’s strongest model yet for math and science, setting new state-of-the-art results on benchmarks like GPQA Diamond and FrontierMath. This post shows how those gains translate into real research progress, including solving an open theoretical problem and generating reliable mathematical proofs.

articles.title: How Tata Power CoE built a scalable AI-powered solar panel inspection solution with Amazon SageMaker AI and Amazon Bedrock
articles.description: In this post, we explore how Tata Power CoE and Oneture Technologies use AWS services to automate the inspection process end-to-end.
articles.author: Chetan Makvana
articles.content: In this post, we explore how Tata Power CoE and Oneture Technologies use AWS services to automate the inspection process end-to-end.

articles.title: Adaptive infrastructure for foundation model training with elastic training on SageMaker HyperPod
articles.description: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod now supports elastic training, enabling your machine learning (ML) workloads to automatically scale based on resource availability. In this post, we demonstrate how elastic training helps you maximize GPU utilization, reduce costs, and accelerate model development through dynamic resource adaptation, while maintain training quality and minimizing manual intervention.
articles.author: Roy Allela
articles.content: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod now supports elastic training, enabling your machine learning (ML) workloads to automatically scale based on resource availability. In this post, we demonstrate how elastic training helps you maximize GPU utilization, reduce costs, and accelerate model development through dynamic resource adaptation, while maintain training quality and minimizing manual intervention.

articles.title: How Harmonic Security improved their data-leakage detection system with low-latency fine-tuned models using Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Bedrock, and Amazon Nova Pro
articles.description: This post walks through how Harmonic Security used Amazon SageMaker AI, Amazon Bedrock, and Amazon Nova Pro to fine-tune a ModernBERT model, achieving low-latency, accurate, and scalable data leakage detection.
articles.author: Babs Khalidson
articles.content: This post walks through how Harmonic Security used Amazon SageMaker AI, Amazon Bedrock, and Amazon Nova Pro to fine-tune a ModernBERT model, achieving low-latency, accurate, and scalable data leakage detection.

articles.title: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Observability with Langfuse
articles.description: In this post, we explain how to integrate Langfuse observability with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore to gain deep visibility into an AI agent's performance, debug issues faster, and optimize costs. We walk through a complete implementation using Strands agents deployed on AgentCore Runtime followed by step-by-step code examples.
articles.author: Richa Gupta
articles.content: In this post, we explain how to integrate Langfuse observability with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore to gain deep visibility into an AI agent's performance, debug issues faster, and optimize costs. We walk through a complete implementation using Strands agents deployed on AgentCore Runtime followed by step-by-step code examples.

articles.title: Increasing revenue 300% by bringing AI to SMBs
articles.description: Discover how Podium used OpenAI’s GPT-5 to build “Jerry,” an AI teammate driving 300% growth and transforming how Main Street businesses serve customers.

articles.title: Create AI-powered chat assistants for your enterprise with Amazon Quick Suite
articles.description: In this post, we show how to build chat agents in Amazon Quick Suite. We walk through a three-layer framework—identity, instructions, and knowledge—that transforms Quick Suite chat agents into intelligent enterprise AI assistants. In our example, we demonstrate how our chat agent guides feature discovery, use enterprise data to inform recommendations, and tailors solutions based on potential to impact and your team’s adoption readiness.
articles.author: Nitish Chaudhari
articles.content: In this post, we show how to build chat agents in Amazon Quick Suite. We walk through a three-layer framework—identity, instructions, and knowledge—that transforms Quick Suite chat agents into intelligent enterprise AI assistants. In our example, we demonstrate how our chat agent guides feature discovery, use enterprise data to inform recommendations, and tailors solutions based on potential to impact and your team’s adoption readiness.

articles.title: Deck the Vaults: ‘Fallout: New Vegas’ Joins the Cloud This Holiday Season
articles.description: Step out of the vault and into the future of gaming with Fallout: New Vegas streaming on GeForce NOW, just in time to celebrate the newest season of the hit Amazon TV show Fallout. To mark the occasion, GeForce NOW members can claim Fallout 3 and Fallout 4 as special rewards, completing a wasteland-ready trilogy Read Article
